Instruction: In a large bowl, combine cubed watermelon, feta cheese, thinly sliced red onion, and chopped fresh mint leaves.
Drizzle balsamic glaze over the salad and gently toss to combine.
Refrigerate the watermelon feta salad for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld.
Serve chilled as a refreshing side dish.
